channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anthropic’s agentic Computer Use is giving people ‘superpowers’
item.description: Claude uses a computer essentially as a human does. People are using it for coding, researching, 'drudge work' and even to hail Uber rides.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield holds steady as consumer sentiment rises
item.description: Treasury yields turned little changed on Friday after data showed durable-goods orders dropped in September and consumer sentiment rose this month.

item.title: Cohere launches new AI models to bridge global language divide
item.description: Cohere released two new open weight AI models from its Aya initiative that looks to expand LLM performance for languages other than English.

item.title: ‘We have been doing this alone.’ We are in our mid-50s with rental properties, CDs and stocks. But we recently downsized and want to retire. So now what?
